title: The First Time Again (CRS113)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Katie Samson first shared on the podcast in December of 2013 about navigating sex and romance after injury.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Katie Samson, kevin Allison)
